FuncDef: The display qos queue statistics command displays queue-based traffic statistics on an interface. The display qos queue statistics command displays queue-based traffic statistics on an interface.
CLIs: display qos queue statistics { interface <interface-name> | interface <interface-type> <interface-number> | slot <slotid> }

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the type of an interface.
-

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Displays statistics about traffic in queues on all interfaces of a specified slot.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo: To check whether packets in each queue on an interface are forwarded or discarded because of congestion, view the statistics on each queue on the interface.
